summary: This test module validates the integration of Lightning's metric result handling with torchmetrics. It defines lightweight dummy metrics, helper utilities, and a suite of tests that examine computation, dtype promotion, synchronization across distributed processes, result collection persistence, and interaction with the logger and checkpointing mechanisms.
